00024 #ifndef _NIF_EFFECT_H_
00025 #define _NIF_EFFECT_H_
00026 
00027 #include "node.hpp"
00028 
00029 namespace Nif
00030 {
00031 
00032 typedef Node Effect;
00033 
00034 // Used for NiAmbientLight and NiDirectionalLight. Might also work for
00035 // NiPointLight and NiSpotLight?
00036 struct NiLight : Effect
00037 {
00038   struct SLight
00039   {
00040     float dimmer;
00041     Vector ambient;
00042     Vector diffuse;
00043     Vector specular;
00044   };
00045 
00046   const SLight *light;
00047 
00048   void read(NIFFile *nif)
00049   {
00050     Effect::read(nif);
00051 
00052     nif->getInt(); // 1
00053     nif->getInt(); // 1?
00054     light = nif->getPtr<SLight>();
00055   }
00056 };
00057 
00058 struct NiTextureEffect : Effect
00059 {
00060   NiSourceTexturePtr texture;
00061 
00062   void read(NIFFile *nif)
00063   {
00064     Effect::read(nif);
00065 
00066     int tmp = nif->getInt();
00067     if(tmp) nif->getInt(); // always 1?
00068 
00069     /*
00070       3 x Vector4 = [1,0,0,0]
00071       int = 2
00072       int = 0 or 3
00073       int = 2
00074       int = 2
00075      */
00076     nif->skip(16*4);
00077 
00078     texture.read(nif);
00079 
00080     /*
00081       byte = 0
00082       vector4 = [1,0,0,0]
00083       short = 0
00084       short = -75
00085       short = 0
00086      */
00087     nif->skip(23);
00088   }
00089 };
00090 
00091 } // Namespace
00092 #endif
